response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial.
